target.description: Wireless network(s) you want to enable (disable)

hotspot_password.name: Hotspot Password
hotspot_password.description: Change guest hotspot password on UniFi network

coordinator.name: Coordinator
coordinator.description: coordinator whose hotspot password you want to change. Limited to one coordinator per service call.

random.name: Random
random.description: Should a randomly generated password be created (default=True). If disabled, a user-provided password must be provided.

method.name: Method
method.description: char = alphanumeric string (no delimiter); word = diceware passphrase (delimiter separated); xkcd = diceware passphrase using XKCD generator (delimiter separated); rainbow = color + noun, salted (no delimiter) (default=word)

delimiter.name: Delimiter
delimiter.description: Character to separate passphrase words [xkcd & word] (default is no delimiter)

min_length.name: Min Length
min_length.description: Minimum word length [xkcd only] (default=5, min=3, max=9)

max_length.name: Max Length
max_length.description: Maximum word length [xkcd only] (default=8, min=3, max=9)

word_count.name: Word Count
word_count.description: Number of words to generate [xkcd & word] (default=4, min=3, max=6)

char_count.name: Char Count
char_count.description: Number of alphanumeric characters to generate [char only] (default=24, min=8, max=63)

random_settings.name: Random Settings
random_settings.description: Configuration options for randomly generated passwords
